elements.content: Do or do not. There is no trying.

elements.description: Probably no one told those goats that they cannot climb. It's not their fault, they didn't know it was impossible.

elements.content:
Get away from a computer for a bit
and make yourself a nice cup of tea
elements.description: It's not an inspirational quote. It's me talking to you. Seriously, go.
Admit it, Steve Ballmer chanting “developers! developers! developers!” will never cease to amaze.

elements.content: Real programmers spend their day fighting
This may take some time and it’s ok.
Don’t be so hard on yourself

elements.description: Jimmy Fallon, The Roots & Star Wars: The Force Awakens Cast Sing Star Wars Medley (A Cappella)
Gossip - Move in the Right Direction
Marvin Gaye, Tammi Terrell - Ain't No Moutain High Enough
Mark Ronson - Uptown Funk ft. Bruno Mars
